ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.

Landmines and explosive weapons - prevention and assistance
Multisector aid for basic social services
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty
Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks
Salt iodization and other large-scale food fortification
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
Technical assistance - Maternal and newborn health
WASH - Enabling environment (policies/strategies, coordination, regulation, financing, planning-monitoring-review, sector capacity development and professionalization)
Water supply - safety/quality/treatment (including household treatment and safe storage)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
